product_name: Redwood Hikes Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks Topographic Trail Map - Generals Highway
long_description: The Redwood Hikes Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks Generals Highway topographic trail map covers this spectacular region's most popular hiking destinations in vivid detail. Full-color map displays car campgrounds, backcountry campsites and all Sequoia groves in the area, including popular groves with easy access and remote, seldom-visited groves. Map is printed on waterproof, tear-resistant material with a plastic coating that offers the durability needed for outdoor use. Measures 9 x 4.5 in. folded and 39 x 27 in. fully opened; scale of 1:25,000. Redwood Hikes Press; copyright 2013.
short_description: The Redwood Hikes Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks Generals Highway topographic trail map covers this spectacular region's most popular hiking destinations in vivid detail.
